entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 40
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
